Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

Klasse
Beschreibung
Board
The `Board` class represents the game board for Othello.
Controller
The Controller class manages the interaction between the OthelloGame model and the user interface (view).
GameState
The `GameState` enum represents the possible states of an Othello game.
IController
 
IView
The `IView` interface defines the methods that should be implemented by any class representing the view in the Othello game.
Main
 
MeineTeste
 
MoveDirection
The `MoveDirection` enum represents the eight possible directions for moves in the Othello game.
OthelloGame
The `OthelloGame` class represents the state and logic of an Othello game.
OthelloView
The graphical view class for the Othello game.
Player
The `Player` class represents a player in the Othello game.
PlayerType
Represents the player types in a board game, such as black and white pieces in chess.
Threads
This class represents a custom thread for managing the flow of an Othello game.
